wikipedia_page.main: Alice Natica Davidson-Richards (born 29 May 1994) is an English cricketer who plays for Kent, South East Stars and Northern Superchargers. A right-handed batter and right-arm pace bowler, she made her county debut for Kent in 2010. She has played 1 ODI and 5 T20Is for England, making her debut in 2018.
